Spoon!

Spoon is a simple Foursquare check-in app for Pebble. The watchapp lists nearby venues using your phone's location. Pick a venue and check-in. All from your wrist.
  • to Facebook/Twitter
  • After Checkin
  • from venue list for an even faster checkin
